author: The Hindu
title: For better use: On MPLADS funds
description: While taking over MPLADS funds to fight the virus, Centre must allocate judiciously
content: The suspension of the Members of Parliament Local Area Development Scheme (MPLADS) for two years to boost the funding available for the COVID-19 fight is a step in the right direction. It may appear at first blush that the decision may undermine the decentral… [+2693 chars]
